title: Wargus - Warcraft 2 for Android
description:
===== Wargus: Warcraft 2 for Android =====


As the title says, this is a port of Warcraft 2 for Android called Wargus. The full game is included here along with the expansion, Beyond the Dark Portal. I've tested this with a Nexus 7 2012 and it runs very smoothly, but performance can vary with every Android device. This is an awesome classic to have for a handheld game, and I wanted to upload this since it was a HUGE pain to get a hold of myself. Anyways, enjoy this classic strategy title :)


=== Instructions ===

1.) Copy the "wargus_warcraft_2_1.apk" anywhere on your device.
2.) Use an APK installer app to install the Wargus apk.
3.) Unzip the contents of "TidesOfDarkness-Wargus-Android.zip" to the home directory of your device.
4.) Start up Wargus and enjoy. If Wargus cannot find the "Wargus-Android" folder, you can browse to it.

**To play the expansion, Unzip the "BeyondTheDarkPortalWargus-Android.zip" to your device instead of the other one.**
